title: Verify dogfooding: new Claude session in claude-golem sees contexts
description: Verification that the dogfooding setup works. A fresh golemClaude session should have all contexts loaded and understand the repo's meta-purpose.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Ask Claude: 'What contexts are loaded?' - should list base, skill-index, workflow/interactive
Ask Claude: 'What is the purpose of this repo?' - should understand self-improvement loop
Ask Claude to 'add a feature' - should suggest creating PRD story, not just implementing
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
Commit: test: V-116 verify dogfooding works
